provisions.title: Section 3
provisions.content:
3.--(1) Except as otherwise provided in section 8, no w-o.
person shall carry about for sale in any parish any goods
unless he is the holder either of a Class A or a Class B
licence under this Act in respect of the parish in which he
carries about such goods for sale.
       (2) No person who is the holder of a Class A licence
under this Act shall carry about for sale in the parish to
which such Class A licence relates any goods to a total
value in excess of ten dollars at any one time.
